name: Logic Camera Store
description1: Fully functional MERN stack web app with Firebase Authentication, where users can log in with email and password or with a google account
description2: Different functionality in Dashboard for normal users and admin
description4: Users can order cameras, manage orders, pay and review their opinion
description5: Admin can manage products, add products and so on.
usedTechnology: React, NodeJS, JavaScript, Material-UI, Firebase, ExpressJS, MongoDB, CSS3

name: Tour Takers
description1: Full Stack and functional web-based Touring related website
description2: where users can explore different touring spots and book for enjoying their free time
description3: Users can place an order, manage order and pay with an international payment system
description4: Responsive for desktop and mobile view with Firebase Authentication System
description5: Admin can manage products, add products and so on.
usedTechnology: React, Bootstrap, React-Bootstrap, Node.js, MongoDB, ExpressJS, Firebase
